item.title: Fri 13 Jan 2023: Rashōmon (羅生門)
item.description: DETAILS: Rashōmon (羅生門) 13 January 2023 8.30 PM UK time / 9.30 PM CET/WAT Duration: 88 mins Watch party: Provo.lol on Twitch Ready to dive back into Heian era Kyoto? We’ve got a murder, four witnesses. Can you figure out who did it? :P Produced in 1950, Japan, directed by Akira Kurosawa. b.y.o.b. + b.y.o 🍕
